steps.name: Given Load username and password of user "user_for_common" as env vars: "USERNAME" and "PASSWORD"
When I run the command with args "record export --base-url $$TEST_KINTONE_BASE_URL --app 1 --username $USERNAME"
Then I should get the exit code is non-zero
And The output error message should match with the pattern: "Password is required \(--password or KINTONE_PASSWORD\)"

items.statusDetails:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: The input did not match the regular expression /\[401\] \[CB_WA01\] Password authentication failed./. Input:
